esema ee pathwu aya aanduwe hitha dinaganima sandaha aanduwe padaya ta natima misa wishwawidyala aramunu sandaha etharam awadhanayak yomu nokirima saha adala amathiwarunge dadabbara saha agathigami kriya samastha usas adhyapana kshethrayama arbudayata gena giye ya (me thaththwaya me mohothe da ee widhiyatama pawathna bawata ek udaharanayak wanne kalaniya wishwawidyalaye upakulapathi path kirima siduwu aakarayayi). 2005 janadhipathiwaranaye di siyayata anupahakma saha 2010 janadhipathiwaranaye di siyayata haththapahak pamana mahinda rajapaksha mahatha samanga siti wishwawidyala aacharyawarun mathu ki hethu nisa 2015 janadhipathiwaranayedi siyayata anunawayakinma pela gasune maithripala sirisena mahathage jayagrahanaya wenuwenya (rate boho rajya aayathanawala sewakayin rajapaksha palanayata erehi wune thama aayathanawala ihatha ki akaraye abhyantharika pradhaninge dadabbara saha anuwana hasirim saha eewata janadhipathige palanaya wagakiwa yuthuya yana mathaye pihita ya).

mehi chayarupa magin obata dakagatha haki wanne 2019 juli masa 27 weni dina katunayaka apa swamiduge siddhasthanaye darshana dewa mandiraya thula pichcha mal suwada wihidi pathiruna dew mawu prathimawa saha sadahawathun mahath bathiyen dew mawunge swargiya suwanda windaganimin, dew mawunta yachnya karamin, owunge ekama illima rathu pettiyata dama dew mawun wetha bara karanu labana andamayi maha maga di mata hamu wu mage aposthuluthuma shuddhoththama aposthuluthumange maniyan swargastha wi wasara dahayak sapire katunayaka apa swamiduge siddhasthanaya wandanakaruwan sadaha wiwruthayi – labana senasurada sawasa 5 sita asirimath dew mawu prathimawa abhiyasata paminiya hakiyi soba dahama wisin dan pruthuwiye katath uganwana dharmaya apata mathak kara dun shreshta adhyathmika guruthuma lehesiyen dakinna bari, lehesiyen kathakaranna hambenne nathi, jiwithaye watinama kenek munagasunama danena sathuta ada siduwemin pawathina me wyasanaya sambandhawa shuddhoththama aposthuluthuma prakasha kale 2012 nowambar 21 wenida kiwu ee agana saukhya katha sihiwena kalayak udawuna aposthuluthumeni daruwan kusa dara sitina mawuwarunta da daruwange piyawarunta da shuddhoththama aposthuluthuman wethin anagi upades rasak aposthuluthumek yanu nidahas kenek kisidu kandayamakata, kalliyakata ho kisidu sabhawakata ayithi pudgalayek nowe – shuddhoththama rohan lalith aponsu aposthuluthuma dadiwa prakasha karayi maranayen kelawara wana dawasata pera udawana wiwaha sanwathsaraya samarannata labunahoth, eya sarthaka wiwaha diwiyaka sundarama sanwathsarayayi – shuddhoththama rohan lalith aponsu aposthuluthumano pawasathi siyaluma puwath methanin balanna ►juli ►juni katunayaka apa swamiduge siddhasthanaya wandanakaruwan sadaha wiwruthayi - labana senasurada sawasa 5 sita asirimath dew mawu prathimawa abhiyasata paminiya hakiyi ►aprel ►marthu aposthuluthumek yanu nidahas kenek kisidu kandayamakata, kalliyakata ho kisidu sabhawakata ayithi pudgalayek nowe - shuddhoththama rohan lalith aponsu aposthuluthuma dadiwa prakasha karayi ►pebarawari maranayen kelawara wana dawasata pera udawana wiwaha sanwathsaraya samarannata labunahoth, eya sarthaka wiwaha diwiyaka sundarama sanwathsarayayi - shuddhoththama rohan lalith aponsu aposthuluthumano pawasathi wasara 63kata pera shuddhoththama aposthuluthuman melowata upan welawa samara madiyam raye di sadahawathun katunayaka apa swamiduge siddhasthanayata rok wethi dew mawu katunayaka apa swamiduge siddhasthanaye darshanaya wima arambai wasara hathalis pahak sapireyi ►janawari shuddhoththama aposthuluthumange upan dina sanwathsaraya heta madiyam raye udawe shuddhoththama rohan lalith aponsu aposthuluthuma melowa diwiye wasara 63 k sampurna karayi - bathimath janathawa me uthum dinaya mewarath mahath ihalin samarannata sudanam wethi obawa athhara dama sathutin jiwathwana siyalu daruwanta yahapathak ma prarthana karanna - wadihiti niwasaka diwi gewana mahalu mapiyan rasak amatha shuddhoththama aposthuluthumo pawasathi lowatama aadarshayak demin athinatha gath ranga prasad saha saduni dilika siya palamu wiwaha sanwathsaraya abhimanawath lesin samarimata saraseyi aluth awurudde shuddhoththama aposthuluthumange surathin kiribath sangrahayak shuddhoththama rohan lalith aponsu aposthuluthuma, aposthuluthumeku washayen siya sathalis paswana naththal diwya puja meheya sidu karayi ►desambar jesu thumange upatha sihipath karannata minisun sudanam wana bawa dana ganimata hakiyawak sathunta thibe nam ahinsaka thirisan sathunge mara lathoniya kese weyida?
